thread.title: BRIEF-Tian An China Investments Co Expects Fall In ‍Profit Of Group For Year Ended Dec. 31

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Tian An China Investments Co Expects Fall In ‍Profit Of Group For Year Ended Dec. 31

organizations.name: tian an china investments co ltd
brief-tian an china investments co expects fall in ‍profit of group

text:
March 7 (Reuters) - Tian An China Investments Co Ltd :
* ‍PROFIT OF GROUP FOR YEAR ENDED 31ST DECEMBER, 2017 WILL SHOW A SIGNIFICANT DECREASE​
* EXPECTED RESULT DUE TO DECREASE IN GAIN FROM DISPOSAL OF SUBSIDIARIES
* ‍EXPECTS AGGREGATE DECREASE IN GAIN OF ABOUT HK$3,800 MILLION FOR FY​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
